parties.in4010.q12015.group16

Class GeneralModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • parties.in4010.q12015.group16.GeneralModel

  • public class GeneralModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model representing the 'average' of all negotiators during a session. This is done by combining all opponent utility spaces and our own utility space halfway through the negotiation into one general utility space. This combining is done by averaging all issue weights and values in all spaces, and putting the average values in the general utility space.
